title: Anyone know this font?
content:
anyone know this font? thanks in advance

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [whats\_the\_font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090826093616/http:/typophile.com/files/whats_the_font.jpg) | 36.6 KB |
author: fsamuel

comments.content:
[Sexsmith](http://web.archive.org/web/20090826093616/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/sexsmith/sexsmith/), yes that’s the name.

See FAQ #2: Please use a [descriptive title for your posting](http://web.archive.org/web/20090826093616/http:/typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq/#Q_2) next time.

thanks renko, sorry for the lame title :)  
cheers

You might also like the free and jolly Pharmacy from Harold’s Fonts:  
 [http://www.haroldsfonts.com/pharmacy.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20090826093616/http:/www.haroldsfonts.com/pharmacy.html "http://www.haroldsfonts.com/pharmacy.html")

Mikey :-)
